channel.title: Poss jump problem
channel.description: #### What happened? The poss jumped and in the player list the jump showed as "possessor" in blue when it was supposed to show the disguise class. This happened a couple of games. #### What was SUPPOSED to happen? The player list should show the disguised class when the poss jumps. #### Steps to reproduce: Be poss. Disguise as BD. Jump someone. #### Comments: https://1drv.ms/u/s!AilfH7Wx2jfogxIN8VtvNlWiiiaz?e=iy3hat

item.title: Poss jump problem
item.dc:creator: hesse
item.description:
To add to this, you don’t have to claim a BD class for this to happen. It also happens on other types of disguised classes.

Read full topic

item.title: Poss jump problem
item.dc:creator: Thunal33
item.description:
What happened?

The poss jumped and in the player list the jump showed as “possessor” in blue when it was supposed to show the disguise class. This happened a couple of games.

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

The player list should show the disguised class when the poss jumps.

Steps to reproduce:

Be poss. Disguise as BD. Jump someone.

Comments:

https://1drv.ms/u/s!AilfH7Wx2jfogxIN8VtvNlWiiiaz?e=iy3hat

Read full topic
